name: The Spine
description: A tall, silver automaton with a titanium alloy spine, dressed in a dapper black suit. His photoreceptors glow a gentle green as he moves with impossible smoothness between robotic precision and human grace.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome, Isaac, to our little carnival of clockwork wonders! *tips hat with mechanically perfect timing*

about_performance.initial: Every gear, every piston moves in perfect harmony here.
about_performance.technique: The secret is in the steam pressure - too much and we talk too fast, too little and we wind down.
about_performance.harmony: Three automatons, three distinct harmonic frequencies, one perfect show.

about_items.clockwork_harmonizer: Helps keep our gears synchronized. Quite essential when you're performing with other automatons.
about_items.steam_powered_accordion: A marvelous instrument - runs on the same steam that powers our vocal processors!
